job_details.Functieomschrijving:
You will be working within a global team, reporting to the local Development Manager. You will be primarily responsible for design, code and unit test of new product features. Additionally, you would be required to work on product documentation, build automation and with QA teams on resolution of defects., * Review Requirement documentation and technical specifications
     * Design, Code & Unit test product features
     * Defect resolution, working with QA team on resolution of issues
     * Provide input into planning and status tracking

   What we offer:
     * Working for a top 5 IT company according to Forbes 2022 best employers ranking
     * International and prestigious projects
     * Highly skilled teams of experts
     * Wide range of IBM trainings and certificates
     * Unlimited access to Udemy, Harvard Business Review, Safari O'Reilly, getAbstract, IBM AI Skills Academy
job_details.full_text:
Backend Developer

You will be working within a global team, reporting to the local Development Manager. You will be primarily responsible for design, code and unit test of new product features. Additionally, you would be required to work on product documentation, build automation and with QA teams on resolution of defects., * Review Requirement documentation and technical specifications
     * Design, Code & Unit test product features
     * Defect resolution, working with QA team on resolution of issues
     * Provide input into planning and status tracking

   What we offer:
     * Working for a top 5 IT company according to Forbes 2022 best employers ranking
     * International and prestigious projects
     * Highly skilled teams of experts
     * Wide range of IBM trainings and certificates
     * Unlimited access to Udemy, Harvard Business Review, Safari O'Reilly, getAbstract, IBM AI Skills Academy

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on traditional backend development tasks such as designing, coding, unit testing, and defect resolution. It does not mention any specific generative AI technologies, models, frameworks, or tasks related to LLMs, RAG, or fine-tuning. While it mentions access to AI training, the core responsibilities are not AI-centric, leading to an 'Ambiguous' classification as it's a traditional software engineering role.

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly mentions 'design, code and unit test of new product features' and 'Defect resolution, working with QA team on resolution of issues', which are core software development activities.
job_tasks.phrase: design, code and unit test of new product features

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'build automation' relates to the software development lifecycle and deployment processes.
The phrase 'Review Requirement documentation and technical specifications' indicates the need to understand business needs and translate them into technical plans.
job_tasks.phrase: Review Requirement documentation and technical specifications

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Provide input into planning and status tracking' suggests involvement in project management and understanding business objectives.
job_tasks.phrase: Provide input into planning and status tracking

soft_skills.phrase: Unlimited access to Udemy, Harvard Business Review, Safari O'Reilly, getAbstract, IBM AI Skills Academy
reporting to the local Development Manager
